add_to_fav_side.message: Move "Add to favourite" button for publication to social networks block

cat_error_name_exist.message: Category with that name already exist

cats_filter.message: Mode for include \ exclude categories from filtered data

cgrid_fixed.message: Fixed amount of elements per row

cgrid_type_dynamic.message: Dynamic number of elements per row

cgrid_type_fixed.message: Fixed number of elements per row

cgrid_lazy.message: Load images only when they in visible area of screen (beta)

download_example.message: Please enter pages, that need to be downloaded (ex. 2, 4, 66-99, 44, 78, 8-9, 29-77 etc.

download_skip_empty.message: Skip publication without media data (plain text, censored, etc.)

download_tip.message: If you want download all pages, just keep field empty

download_tag_filter_1.message: Select tags, post that includes that tags will be saved. For example "art, girl". If you want to exclude some publications with specifed tags, then type tags with sybmbol "-" before tag name. For example "-carrot, -dog, -minecraft"

download_tag_filter_empty.message: If tag filter list empty, all publications will be included

download_createc_1.message: If publication contain one of the described tags, catagory will be automaticly added

download_createc_by_tag.message: Automaticly create category by tag name

download_pages_autosave.message: Autosave after to separate file after setted number of pages

download_save_notice.message: Saved profile can be added to extension thow menu (Options -> Profiles -> Add new profile)

download_limitpages.message: Selection hit limit (__CURRENTPAGESPERIMPORT__). Please set export pages manualy (not more then __MAXPAGESPERIMPORT__ pages per one operation)

download_partly.message: Only part of data was loaded (see log for more info). You still can download loaded data as profile

download_empty.message: List of found publications is empty (see log for more info)

ext_description.message: Save favourite publications to your local browser storage.

fast_save_uniq.message: Uniquify name if file already exist

fast_save_overwrite.message: Overwrite file if file with same name already exist

fast_save_check_notice.message: If file already downloaded, then green marker will be adedd to download button

grabber_selected_items_not_found.message: Cant select any items for download setted in "Items" field

grabber_name_template_help.message:
Please select file name template, with include relative patch from base folder in browser Downloads folder

Allowed variables :

grabber_name_template_help_1.message: #category_1#, #category_2#, #category_N# - names of 1, 2 and N categorys of downloaded item (by priority)

grabber_name_template_help_2.message:
#filename# - original file name
#id# - unique id in current selected local storage
#number# - item number in current order

grabber_name_template_help_3.message:
#name# - sign
Usage
"#filename#" - download file with original name (ex. Downloads/dog.jpg)

grabber_name_template_help_4.message: "#category_1#/#filename#" - download file with original name and put it to subdirectory with name of first category (ex. Downloads/Dogs/dog.jpg)

grabber_options_notice.message: Different options for support browsers. Change only if something not work

grabber_transport.message: Way of how to transport data to background process

grabber_request_help.message: Browser cant download file directly for security reasons if image domain and site domain differs

grabber_request_help_1.message: For example http://www.example.com and http://example.com counts as different domain and will be blocked by CORS

grabber_request_help_2.message: We can use - "Iframe", that will answer by reglamented format

grabber_request_help_3.message: Also if you still want to use direct download by XMLHttpRequest method, just search extension that disable security options ex. "Allow-Control-Allow-Origin: * extension"

grabber_request_help_4.message: Change this option only if "XMLHttpRequest" dont work

grabber_transport_help.message: 1. Blob URL - Send url that refer to data to background process (Blob -> Download API)

grabber_transport_help_1.message: 2. Binary Data - Send binary data encoded in base64 format to background process (Blob -> Binary Base64 -> Blob -> Download API)

grabber_transport_help_2.message: Change this option if you can't download any thing (log files, profiles)

hide_soc.message: Hide social networks markers from publication block

init_css_error.message: Initialization error (unable to load CSS files)

fav_list_empty.message: List of favourite items is empty

nsfw_tip.message: Auto deselect categories that marked as NSFW

options_side.message: Move extension options button to sidebar

storage_create_add_if_exist.message: Add new items if profile already exits (beta)

storage_create_cancel_if_exist.message: Cancel if already exist with same id

storage_manager_localstorage_notice.message: For selected storage type (localstorage) max amount of space is limited and in common case can't be more then 4mb. Please delete unused profiles if you near to this limit, or select another storage type

storage_manager_api_notice.message: For selected storage type (Browser API) max amount of space is __MAX_ENV_SIZE__mb (maximum per profile file __MAX_TOTAL_PER_DB__mb)

storage_manager_hit_limit_db.message: Profile file can't be more than __MAX_TOTAL_PER_DB__mb

storage_manager_hit_limit_env.message: Reached max amount of data for current environment (more then __MAX_ENV_SIZE__mb)

storage_type_notice.message: Change storage type only if needed. After change, your current profile list will be hidden, until switch back to previouse storage type

storage_create_e1.message: Error while save profile to localstorage (turn on debug mode an watch F12 console)

storage_create_e2.message: Bad profile file format (JSON parse fail)

storage_import_limit.message: File is too big (maximum file size __MAX_CONFIG_SIZE__ mb). Uploaded file __FILESIZE__ mb.

sync_by_add.message: If user is logged in, dublicates publication to main favourites storage
